title: so why does PYKE get a reset on R if he doesnt get the kill ?
body:
basically title

seen a lot of VODS where pyke gets R reset and he isnt the one who dealt the killing blow

thats not how it works on darius...not getting killing blow, puts R on CD

so why is pyke special ?

replies.body: Pyke's ult can be recast if an enemy champion dies in the X. Pyke isn't Darius.
Although I agree that simply because Darius has the mechanic doesn't mean Pyke should, I do think that him not needing to land the killing blow with his ult for the reset is a bit stupid.
Cassiopeia's E has the same mechanic. It's nothing new.
Cass's E is a regular spell, not an ultimate like Pyke's.
And? You think his power budget doesn't include that mechanic being in his ult?
